ARCHBISHOP GRINDAL TO HENRY BULLINGER.

Dated at Yonn, July 31, 1573.

HEAL'rn in Christ! About the end of December last, my (learcst master Bullinger‚ I received your letter written on the 24th of August; on which day, by a savagc and unheard of cruelty, the Admiral³ with other nobility‚ and the greatest part of the faithful, were massacred at Paris. These are the fruits of that egregious treaty with Franco, from which we expected so much advantage!
